For Part 1, the instructions follow this general structure to create a rectangular prism: - Sketch a rectangle (sequence of lines and arcs) with specific dimensions [loop_1] - Extrude the rectangle into a 3D prism [extrusion_1] Additionally, for future reference, you can create cylindrical or other curved shapes by following the below structure: - Sketch curves (circles, arcs, or lines) that define a curved shape on the 2D sketch plane [loop_1] - Extrude or revolve the curves into a 3D body (depending on the cross-sections and design intent) [extrusion_1 or revolution_1]</description>
